name: The Moonlight Bizarre
description:
An interactive narrative set in Saint John, New Brunswick on the week of the 50th anniversary of the moon landing. 

***For desktop and Android. ***

Please visit @decayoffundy on Instagram to experience the full prologue. 

Sounds featured: 

Mort Garson - Solomon's Ring 

NESSongsRun - Iron Butterfly-In a Gadda Da Vida (8-Bit Remix) 

8 Bit Universe - The Final Countdown (8 Bit Remix)

**PATCH 1.1: Fixed issue where some players reported to begin en-media-res. Fixed minor audio and playability issues. Added disclaimer that game performs on desktop and Android only (sorry iPhone users!). Mac users may experience audio issues.**
